name: Shubham Kumar
title: Senior Data Analyst
brief_summary:
Shubham Kumar is a Senior Data Analyst at KPIT Technologies Pvt. Ltd., leveraging a B.Tech (H) degree in Electrical Engineering from the esteemed Indian Institute of Technology Bhubaneswar. Recognized for academic excellence, Shubham's journey includes top-tier achievements in multiple national level examinations.
His expertise spans Analog-Digital/Mixed Signal Circuit Design, Automatic Control Systems, Signal Processing, Communication Systems, Image Processing, and IoT-based secure communication. Shubham excels in wearable gadgets, focusing on signal lifecycle management.
Beyond academics, Shubham is a versatile contributor, participating actively in badminton, leading events at the Alumni Cell, and contributing to the Robotics and Intelligent Systems Club. Proficient in languages like C, C++, Python, etc. he is also well-versed in 2D Graphics Design, proficiently using Adobe tools.
In essence, he is a person with a rich educational background, diverse skill set, and a proven record of success, making him a valuable asset for data analysis and technology role.
areas_of_interest: Analog-Digital/Mixed Signal Circuit Designing and Simulation especially for IoT based systems
Automatic control systems with special focus on robust and optimal control mechanism
Image processing: character & pattern recognition system
IoT based secure communication and networking
Wearable gadgets functioning: signal acquisition, processing, transmission and communication

education.school: St. Francis D’ Assisi Senior Secondary School, Guwahati
education.subjects: English Communication, Hindi, Mathematics, Science, Social Science

scholastic: Selected in top 0.1% students in the JEE-Mains 2014
Among the top-25 candidates in the State-level Engineering Entrance Exam: Assam CEE 2014
Selected for INSPIRE Winter Science Camp 2010 in Class IX hosted by IIT Guwahati for class IX, X toppers

Secured first rank consistently for 2003-2011 (before dropping out in 2011) in the Annual Art Examinations conducted by Art Training Centre, Guwahati, Assam affiliated under Bangiya Sangeet Parishad, Kolkata, West Bengal
Awarded the prestigious Ankan Bivakar (Master Artist) by the Bangiya Sangeet Parishad in 2009-10
Awarded First Prize in the Creative Craft: International Art & Craft Contest 2008- School Level in Class VIII
non_scholastic: Key member of the Badminton Team and played badminton tournaments for the Institute
Core Head of Events Management Team of Institute’s Alumni Cell
A former core member of the RISC (Robotics and Intelligent Systems Club), took part in many events organized in the Institute
Participates actively in online tutoring platform: EdX, Coursera and Udemy for courses on Electrical Engineering, standard C and C++ Programming etc.
Maintains my own blog at Wordpress.com: www.meetshubhamkumarhere.wordpress.com
Passionate Graphics Designer (especially interested at DTP) using software tools such as Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Fireworks, Adobe InDesign, Adobe InCopy and Adobe Acrobat Pro

projects.name: SCI-CALC
projects.description: A CLI based general purpose complete scientific calculator programmed in C++ with lots of innovative and detailed features having over 4000+ lines of code.

projects.name: SR-DOMOTICA
projects.description: A Voice Controlled Home Automation system having connectivity using Bluetooth (less-distant communication) and GSM (much-distant communication) with an innovatively designed Android Application interface. Status: Completed.

projects.name: SOULEVA
projects.description: A simple Sound Level Monitoring System, to detect any audio activity: gives information about frequency (Hz), Voltage amplitude (V), Loudness (in dB-A) in the LCD panel, and display the waveform shape in real-time on a GLCD panel using Arduino MEGA 2560. Status: Completed.

projects.name: IOT-BASED SENSORY DATA ANALYSIS
projects.description: Made a simple IoT based Vibration and Temperature detection module; send the generated data to the computer using MCU ATMega328 PU via serial to USB connector, for sending the data on the Internet for displaying real-time signal variation and its data analysis. Status: Completed.

projects.name: AIDE- A SMART GOGGLE
projects.description: It is a wearable Smart Goggle System, it is an assistant (or helper), to perform simple tasks just by doing eye movements. Status: Completed

projects.name: INTERNSHIP: ELECTRONIC & RADAR DEVELOPMENT ESTABLISHMENT (DRDO), BENGALURU
projects.description: We build an FMCW based RADAR Design for Object’s position and velocity  Detection in 2D along with building the Graphical User Interface (GUI) of the MATLAB App (My RADAR) & tested the corresponding algorithms in Simulink Environment. Status: Completed.

projects.name: B. TECH. (H) PROJECT: IOT-BASED AUTO-TRANSLATION OF GESTURE ANIMATION SYNTHESIS SYSTEM FOR BODY AREA NETWORK (BAN)
projects.description: The aim of the project is to make a Gesture Animation Synthesis System that utilizes hand gestures as input to control or interact with connected devices without physically touching them so as to enables humans to communicate with the machine which forms the basis for Human Machine Interaction (HMI) and interact naturally without taking aid of any mechanical devices. Status: Completed.

other_courses.name: MATHWORKS MATLAB + RASPBERRY PI WORKSHOP 2016
details: Hosted by Mathworks (India-HQ Bangalore) Senior Hardware Engineering Division employee at IIT Bhubaneswar on Photo and Video Processing after Data acquisition (through Microsoft Kinect and RaspiCam for Raspberry Pi)
Followed by a hands-on training on Simulink environment to develop models for the same.

other_courses.name: NETWORK BULLS EDUCATING NETWORK with E-CELL, IIT BOMBAY
details: Understanding fundamentals of Computer Networking (routing switching technologies along with IP addressing schemes, routing basics, switching, WAN technologies, Network Security fundamentals, Network Automation and Network Programmability basics) & creating networking models on Cisco Packet Tracer Software.

other_courses.name: INDWELL AUTOMATION with DESIGN & INNOVATION CENTRE, IIT BHUBANESWAR
details: PLC Training (Introduction, types, hardware and software, micro and modular PLCs, logic development tricks, Important instructions, Industrial programs and industrial automation devices)
HMI Training (Introduction, hardware and software, operator panel and touch panel, HMI screen development, PLC interface, security level and P/W protection)
SCADA Training (Introduction, different tag creation, drive configuration, tags configuration, screens development, device tagging and PLC communication)
DRIVES Training (Introduction, parameter setting, multi speed, wiring, PLC interface)

other_courses.name: KPIT ECODE-GENESIS TRAINING (JULY-SEPTEMBER, 2018)
details: Intensive training on standard C, embedded C (ATmega series - AVR), C++, Java SE, Javascript + NodeJS, Python, Azure Cloud Computing.
